entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who gasped and massaged her throat.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a professor who barked at Peeves and straightened her hat.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who cackled and lobbed water bombs.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is the location where students are present.

entities.name: headmaster
entities.description: The headmaster is a person who will be called by Professor McGonagall.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall scolds Peeves for his behavior.
Peeves targets the Great Hall with water bombs.
Professor McGonagall will call the headmaster due to Peeves' behavior.
